src:
Tantang Tira Persikabo, Persebaya Berharap Bisa Pinjam Osvaldo Haay
05 Nov 2019, 18:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya berharap bisa menggunakan jasa Osvaldo Haay ketika menghadapi PS Tira Persikabo. Green Force berniat untuk meminjamnya dari Timnas Indonesia U-23.
Osvaldo Haay diketahui kembali bergabung dengan Garuda Muda setelah sebelumnya dicoret karena cedera. Pemain asal Papua tersebut langsung mengikuti pemusatan latihan di Jakarta.
Menurut pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso, dirinya belum bisa memastikan apakah bisa meminjam Osvaldo Haay. Tetapi, dia sangat berharap bisa diizinkan oleh tim pelatih timnas Indonesia U-23.
"Saya belum tahu, mungkin saya nanti akan berkomunikasi dengan manajemen," kata Aji Santoso, pelatih Persebaya, Selasa (5/11/2019).
"Tetapi seharusnya boleh lah, mungkin H-2 bisa diizinkan pulang," imbuh mantan juru taktik Persela Lamongan tersebut.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Challenge Tira Persikabo, Persebaya Hopes to Be able to Borrow Osvaldo Haay
05 Nov 2019, 18:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya hopes to use the services of Osvaldo Haay when facing PS Tira Persikabo. Green Force intends to borrow it from the Indonesian National Team U-23.
Osvaldo Haay is known to have rejoined Garuda Muda after he was previously dropped because of an injury. The player from Papua immediately followed the training camp in Jakarta.
According to Persebaya's coach, Aji Santoso, he could not confirm whether he could borrow Osvaldo Haay. However, he really hopes to be allowed by the Indonesian U-23 national team coach team.
"I don't know yet, maybe I will communicate with management later," said Aji Santoso, coach of Persebaya, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
"But it should be allowed, maybe the H-2 could be allowed to go home," added the former Persela Lamongan tactician.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
